DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Study Site Human Study Subject First Clinical Trial Epoch Study Subject Begin Date java.util.Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A healthcare organization, a facility, a healthcare provider, or a part or a constituent of any of the above entities directly involved in conducting a particular clinical study.:A living individual about whom an investigator conducting research obtains data through intervention or interaction with the individual or through identifiable private information._Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:A segment of the trial during which similar activities take place for all participants.:A matter or an individual that is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, or/and treated in the course of a particular study.:Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.:The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen._Generic value domain for a java datatype that represents a specific instant in time, with millisecond precision.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Study Site Human Study Subject First Clinical Trial Epoch Study Subject Begin Date
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A healthcare organization, a facility, a healthcare provider, or a part or a constituent of any of the above entities directly involved in conducting a particular clinical study.:A living individual about whom an investigator conducting research obtains data through intervention or interaction with the individual or through identifiable private information._Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:A segment of the trial during which similar activities take place for all participants.:A matter or an individual that is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, or/and treated in the course of a particular study.:Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.:The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Clinical Study Site Human Study Subject
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A healthcare organization, a facility, a healthcare provider, or a part or a constituent of any of the above entities directly involved in conducting a particular clinical study.:A living individual about whom an investigator conducting research obtains data through intervention or interaction with the individual or through identifiable private information.

Concepts.definition: A healthcare organization, an institution, a facility, a healthcare provider, or a part or a constituent of any of the above entities directly involved in conducting a particular clinical study.
A living individual about whom an investigator conducting research obtains data through intervention or interaction with the individual or through identifiable private information.

Property.preferredName: First Clinical Trial Epoch Study Subject Begin Date
Property.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:A segment of the trial during which similar activities take place for all participants.:A matter or an individual that is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, or/and treated in the course of a particular study.:Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.:The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
A portion of a study containing one or more study segments with a consistent objective such as screening subjects or treating disease.
A matter or an individual that is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, or/and treated in the course of a particular study.
Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.
The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Generic value domain for a java datatype that represents a specific instant in time, with millisecond precision.

ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: 10.14.20 TL changed WFS from DRAFT NEW to RETIRED ARCHIVED and added an End Date in preparation of OneData.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
